languages.text: Капитан Вести сообщил, что вылазка его отряда проходит без происшествий, мистических или иных. Выживших членов экипажа на корабле не обнаружено. Тел — тоже. Однако отряд столкнулся с проблемой — проход в ту часть палуб, где расположен арсенал и хранилище, сильно поврежден, особенно — кабели электропроводки. Движение дальше могло представлять опасность.

traits.locale_text: Капитан Вести сообщил, что вылазка его отряда проходит без происшествий, мистических или иных. Выживших членов экипажа на корабле не обнаружено. Тел — тоже. Однако отряд столкнулся с проблемой — проход в ту часть палуб, где расположен арсенал и хранилище, сильно поврежден, особенно — кабели электропроводки. Движение дальше могло представлять опасность.

languages.text: Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.
languages.original_text: Капитан Вести сообщил, что вылазка его отряда проходит без происшествий, мистических или иных. Выживших членов экипажа на корабле не обнаружено. Тел — тоже. Однако отряд столкнулся с проблемой — проход в ту часть палуб, где расположен арсенал и хранилище, сильно поврежден, особенно — кабели электропроводки. Движение дальше могло представлять опасность.

Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

languages.text: El capitán Vesti informó de que la expedición de su unidad había progresado sin incidencias, ni místicas ni de otra índole. Tampoco habían encontrado supervivientes ni cadáveres de la tripulación. Lo que sí habían encontrado era un obstáculo: el camino a la sección de la cubierta que albergaba el arsenal y el depósito estaba gravemente dañado, especialmente el cableado. Continuar podría ser muy peligroso.
languages.original_text: Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: El capitán Vesti informó de que la expedición de su unidad había progresado sin incidencias, ni místicas ni de otra índole. Tampoco habían encontrado supervivientes ni cadáveres de la tripulación. Lo que sí habían encontrado era un obstáculo: el camino a la sección de la cubierta que albergaba el arsenal y el depósito estaba gravemente dañado, especialmente el cableado. Continuar podría ser muy peligroso.

languages.text: 维斯提上尉报告说，他的部队目前为止还没有遇到任何意外，无论是常规的事故还是神秘力量导致的意外。他们既没有发现任何生还者，也没有看到任何尸体。不过，他们的部队确实遇到了问题——通往甲板军火库与储藏库的通道已经被严重破坏，电源线路受损尤为严重，继续前进可能会有危险。
languages.original_text: Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: 维斯提上尉报告说，他的部队目前为止还没有遇到任何意外，无论是常规的事故还是神秘力量导致的意外。他们既没有发现任何生还者，也没有看到任何尸体。不过，他们的部队确实遇到了问题——通往甲板军火库与储藏库的通道已经被严重破坏，电源线路受损尤为严重，继续前进可能会有危险。

languages.text: ヴェスティ中隊長は、彼の部隊の進軍はこれまでのところ、心霊現象の有無に関わらず、何事もなく進んでいると報告した。船のクルーの中で生存者は見つからなかった。さらに言えば、死体も見つかっていない。しかし、部隊は問題に出くわした。兵器庫と保管庫のあるデッキエリアへとつながる通路、特に電力ケーブルが深刻な損傷を受けている。これ以上進むと危険そうだ。
languages.original_text: Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: ヴェスティ中隊長は、彼の部隊の進軍はこれまでのところ、心霊現象の有無に関わらず、何事もなく進んでいると報告した。船のクルーの中で生存者は見つからなかった。さらに言えば、死体も見つかっていない。しかし、部隊は問題に出くわした。兵器庫と保管庫のあるデッキエリアへとつながる通路、特に電力ケーブルが深刻な損傷を受けている。これ以上進むと危険そうだ。

languages.text: Captain Vesti berichtete, der Vorstoß seiner Einheit sei bisher ereignislos verlaufen, nichts Mystisches oder sonst etwas. Sie hatten keine Überlebenden der Schiffscrew gefunden. Leichen übrigens auch nicht. Aber die Einheit war auf ein anderes Problem gestoßen – der Gang zu dem Deckbereich mit dem Arsenal und dem Lager war schwer beschädigt, vor allem die Stromkabel. Weiter vorzustoßen, könnte gefährlich sein.
languages.original_text: Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Captain Vesti berichtete, der Vorstoß seiner Einheit sei bisher ereignislos verlaufen, nichts Mystisches oder sonst etwas. Sie hatten keine Überlebenden der Schiffscrew gefunden. Leichen übrigens auch nicht. Aber die Einheit war auf ein anderes Problem gestoßen – der Gang zu dem Deckbereich mit dem Arsenal und dem Lager war schwer beschädigt, vor allem die Stromkabel. Weiter vorzustoßen, könnte gefährlich sein.

languages.text: Vesti expliqua que l'incursion de son unité s'était déroulée sans incident, mystique ou autre, jusqu'à présent. Ils n'avaient trouvé aucun survivant, ni même de cadavres. Cependant, un problème se dressait sur leur chemin : pour atteindre l'arsenal et l'entrepôt, il fallait emprunter en passage considérablement endommagé, surtout au niveau des câbles électriques. Aller plus loin pourrait être dangereux.
languages.original_text: Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Vesti expliqua que l'incursion de son unité s'était déroulée sans incident, mystique ou autre, jusqu'à présent. Ils n'avaient trouvé aucun survivant, ni même de cadavres. Cependant, un problème se dressait sur leur chemin : pour atteindre l'arsenal et l'entrepôt, il fallait emprunter en passage considérablement endommagé, surtout au niveau des câbles électriques. Aller plus loin pourrait être dangereux.

languages.text: Yüzbaşı Vesti, biriminin keşif çalışmalarının pürüzsüzce ilerlediğini rapor etti. Herhangi bir sıradan ya da doğaüstü olayla karşılaşmadıklarını belirtti, geminin mürettebatından hayatta kalan birini bulamadıklarını fakat herhangi bir cesede de rastlamadıklarını ilaveten bildirdi. Bunlara ek olarak birimin tek bir sorunu vardı: Depolama ve cephaneliğin bulunduğu güverteye açılan geçitte ağır hasar mevcuttu ve bilhassa güç kabloları, ilerlemek için büyük tehlike arz ediyordu.
languages.original_text: Captain Vesti reported that his unit's foray had so far proceeded without incident, mystical or otherwise. They had found no survivors from the ship's crew. Or bodies, for that matter. However, the unit had encountered a problem — the passage leading to the deck section with the arsenal and storage depot was seriously damaged, especially the power cables. Proceeding further could be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Yüzbaşı Vesti, biriminin keşif çalışmalarının pürüzsüzce ilerlediğini rapor etti. Herhangi bir sıradan ya da doğaüstü olayla karşılaşmadıklarını belirtti. Geminin mürettebatından hayatta kalan birini bulamadıklarını ancak herhangi bir cesede de rastlamadıklarını ekledi. Ancak birimin tek bir sorunu vardı: Depolama ve cephaneliğin bulunduğu güverteye açılan geçit, ağır hasarlıydı ve bilhassa güç kabloları, ilerlemek için büyük tehlike arz ediyordu.
